title: Recently my screen call button has decided to answer phone calls instead of screen calls. Why?
content:
Has anything been updated or changed recently that would disable the screen call feature on US based Pixel 3's? This issue has been ongoing for at least two weeks and I was hoping it would be fixed with an update.

When I press screen call on incoming calls, it answers the phone and the phone menu drops to the background.

I haven't changed any settings since I bought the phone two months ago.

Thanks!
ASC
